Home Course Contact

Available Course:

  • BE-Aeronautical Engineering
    The Department of Aeronautical Engineering stands as a prestigious entity within the aerospace engineering domain, delivering an all-encompassing curriculum specifically tailored to equip students with the requisite expertise for engaging in the design, development, and operation of aircraft and spacecraft. The department is staffed by a proficient faculty cohort, comprising seasoned professionals who demonstrate unwavering dedication to furnishing students with the essential knowledge and proficiency essential for excelling within this dynamic discipline.
  • BE-Electronics And Communication Engineering
    The department of Electronics and Communica­tion Engineering was established in the year 2001, offering B.E(ECE) and M.E (Com­munication Systems). The UG programme is thrice ac­credited by NBA, New Delhi and permanently affiliat­ed to Anna University, Chennai. The department pro­motes R & D activities in related areas in collaboration with the industries.
  • BE-Electrical And Electronics Engineering
    The vibrant EEE department was started in the year 2002 and at present the department has one PG course. The department has been accredited by NAAC and NBA. The Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering is an esteemed division within the engineering domain, specializing in the study and application of electrical and electronics principles.
  • BE-Bio Medical Engineering
    The Department of Biomedical Engineering was established in the year 2018. Biomedical Engineering is the application of the principles and problem-solving techniques of Engineering to Biology and Medicine.
  • BE-Computer Sicence Engineering
    The department of Computer Science and Engineering was started in 2001 with the primary objective of providing world class education in the field of information technology, addressed towards the problems of today and tomorrow. The department endeavors to produce confident professionals tuned to the real time working environment.
  • BE-Mechanical Engineering
    The department of Mechanical Engineering was established in 2004. The department offers Undergraduate Programme in Mechanical Engineering and Post graduate Programme in Engineering Design and Ph.D are offered from the year 2009. It is equipped with state-of-the-art workshops, laboratories and computing facilities
  • BE-Civil Engineering
    Civil Engineering is one of the major disciplines in the Engineering profession and its principles are involved in the design, development, construction and maintenance of structures. The Department of Civil Engineering has been established in the year 2005 and M.E Structural Engineering in the year 2012.
  • B.TECH-Information Technology
    Information Technology has widened and diversified in more directions than the pioneers themselves foresaw. India being a nation with the highest number of mobile users offers a very great potential to application developers (for Smart phones). The Department of Information Technology was established in 2001 with the objective of imparting quality education in the field of Information Technology.
  • B.TECH-Chemical Engineering
    Chemical engineers apply the principles of chemistry, biology, physics, and math to solve problems that involve in the production or use of chemicals, fuel, drugs, food, and many other products. They design processes and equipment for large-scale manufacturing, plan, and test production methods and by-products treatment, and direct facility operations.
